Templates¶

New in version 2.4.

Grappelli includes a Documentation about the HTML/CSS-Framework.

If you´re using the default URL-pattern (see Quick start guide) you´ll find the documentation at:

/grappelli/grp-doc/

Note

This is fairly new and will be improved with future releases.
